@description.name: @description
@description.body:
EXPERIMENTAL!

A widget cell provider provides the {@link qx.ui.virtual.layer.WidgetCell}
with configured widgets to render the cells and pools/releases unused
cell widgets.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: This method returns the configured cell for the given cell. The return value may be null to indicate that the cell should be empty.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} The configured widget for the given cell.
@return.description: The configured widget for the given cell.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Release the given cell widget. Either pool or destroy the widget.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: widget {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} The cell widget to pool.
